name: Split (Corporate Actions)
display_expr: 'Split: '+format_number(transactions[0].position_size_with_sign, decimal_pos=2, thousand_sep=' ', use_grouping=True)+' of '+transactions[0].instrument.name+' Cash: '+format_number(transactions[0].cash_consideration, decimal_pos=2, thousand_sep=' ', use_grouping=True)+' '+transactions[0].settlement_currency.short_name+' to '+transactions[0].portfolio.user_code

book_transaction_layout.name: Form layout of transaction type: Split (Corporate Actions)
